name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Takanashi Kiara 4th Anniversary Live ~「MIRAGE」WITH A SURPRISE!？ #Kiara4years [0LoG81pLS8c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Kiara greets the audience and introduces the next song.
Takanashi Kiara performs a cover of 'NICE TYPE' by KIRA.

subtitles.original: 半分
subtitles.english: Half

subtitles.original: Don't break I will never give up
subtitles.english: Don't break I will never give up

subtitles.original: Don't break 願わくしてもう
subtitles.english: Don't break, even if I overcome my wishes

subtitles.original: 消せない強さだ
subtitles.english: It's a strength that cannot be erased

subtitles.original: 時のシルエット
subtitles.english: The silhouette of time

subtitles.original: 舞い上がる大地に
subtitles.english: On the earth that soars

subtitles.original: 目を伏せ
subtitles.english: Cast your eyes down

subtitles.original: 燃ゆる夜明けの中で
subtitles.english: In the burning dawn

subtitles.original: 目覚ます
subtitles.english: Awaken

subtitles.original: 刃交わし吐息が
subtitles.english: The sigh of crossing blades

subtitles.original: 交わした契りは
subtitles.english: The vow we exchanged

subtitles.original: Eyes on you, neon lights at the break of day
subtitles.english: Eyes on you, neon lights at the break of day

subtitles.original: I've been trying to find my destiny
subtitles.english: I've been trying to find my destiny

subtitles.original: But they keep pushing and pulling me away
subtitles.english: But they keep pushing and pulling me away

subtitles.original: If I go on what awaits me in the dark
subtitles.english: If I go on what awaits me in the dark

subtitles.original: Could you tell me please where I need to go
subtitles.english: Could you tell me please where I need to go

subtitles.original: Tell me, I can hear it clearly
subtitles.english: Tell me, I can hear it clearly

subtitles.original: Tell me, 声なき声に
subtitles.english: Tell me, in the voiceless voice

subtitles.original: みなぎる決意は
subtitles.english: The determination that overflows

subtitles.original: 影をはがす
subtitles.english: Tears away the shadows

subtitles.original: 焔降り注ぐ空に
subtitles.english: In the sky where flames pour down

subtitles.original: 身をやつして
subtitles.english: Exhausting myself

subtitles.original: 乱れた火花は
subtitles.english: The disturbed sparks

subtitles.original: 紅化粧
subtitles.english: Red makeup

subtitles.original: 天降る死でも
subtitles.english: Even death from heaven

subtitles.original: 生き抜いてみせる
subtitles.english: I will survive

subtitles.original: Blazing flames show me the path to luminous
subtitles.english: Blazing flames show me the path to luminous

subtitles.original: And in the next life, I promise I will find you
subtitles.english: And in the next life, I promise I will find you

subtitles.original: Kikiriki! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Kikiriki! Yeah!

subtitles.original: We're so back! Welcome to my 4th year anniversary 3D live! Yay!
subtitles.english: We're so back! Welcome to my 4th year anniversary 3D live! Yay!

subtitles.original: That was HINOTORI REDSHIFT Remix.
subtitles.english: That was HINOTORI REDSHIFT Remix.

subtitles.original: The first time I ever performed this version of it.
subtitles.english: The first time I ever performed this version of it.

subtitles.original: Did you like the comeback of the Kikiriki? Kyah!
subtitles.english: Did you like the comeback of the Kikiriki? Kyah!

subtitles.original: Well, well, well...
subtitles.english: Well, well, well...

subtitles.original: Let me take you through the stage a little bit.
subtitles.english: Let me take you through the stage a little bit.

subtitles.original: This is our new stage. It looks so luxurious and beautiful.
subtitles.english: This is our new stage. It looks so luxurious and beautiful.

subtitles.original: Wow, so shiny, I know.
subtitles.english: Wow, so shiny, I know.

subtitles.original: Well, we also have a very, or I have a very special surprise
subtitles.english: Well, we also have a very, or I have a very special surprise

subtitles.original: for you guys at the end of this live.
subtitles.english: for you guys at the end of this live.

subtitles.original: The last song... hmm, what could it be?
subtitles.english: The last song... hmm, what could it be?

subtitles.original: It will still stay a surprise, but please still stay until the very end.
subtitles.english: It will still stay a surprise, but please still stay until the very end.

subtitles.original: And we have many guests too, that you may already have seen or heard about.
subtitles.english: And we have many guests too, that you may already have seen or heard about.

subtitles.original: So look forward to them!
subtitles.english: So look forward to them!

subtitles.original: Yeah! The next song will be a cover song from KIRA,
subtitles.english: Yeah! The next song will be a cover song from KIRA,

subtitles.original: my song even though, you know, similar vibe to my original songs.
subtitles.english: my song even though, you know, similar vibe to my original songs.

subtitles.original: So please enjoy, NICE TYPE!
subtitles.english: So please enjoy, NICE TYPE!

subtitles.original:
NICE TYPE
Lyrics: Asteroid Music Team (monii, KIRA)
Music: Asteroid Music Team (KIRA, monii, Johnny R)
subtitles.english:
NICE TYPE

subtitles.english: It's getting dark, better watch your back

subtitles.english: Better pay attention now

subtitles.english: A demon on the loose, I'm c-c-cowering for you now

subtitles.english: Watching and teasing, make it so easy

subtitles.english: To set you at ease, listen

subtitles.original: But baby, why don't you give in?
subtitles.english: But baby, why don't you give in?

subtitles.english: Feeling, you want it, I need it, go get it

subtitles.english: Dreaming, believe it, take control

subtitles.english: Satisfy the hunger, got you lo-lo-locked down

subtitles.english: Still begging for more, sinister allure

subtitles.english: I'll let you come inside my mind

subtitles.english: Don't be polite

subtitles.english: Got you on your knees

subtitles.english: I never claimed to be the nice type

subtitles.english: I'm touching now, innocent to you

subtitles.english: You're looking for the helper, ain't no use
